title: hardware
description: a hardware subsystem part of the infrastructure running the computing task

component_name.description: the type of this subsystem part of your infrastructure, example: cpu, gpu, hdd, sdd...

nb_component.description: the number of this component in your infrastructure

memory_size.description: the size of the memory of the component in Go

manufacturer.description: the name of the manufacturer, example: NVIDIA

family.description: the family of this component, example: GeForce

series.description: the series of this component, example: RTX 4080

share.description: the percentage of the physical equipment which is assigned to you
